short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It's time to call liberals by their true name: The Half Naked Blood-Crazed Coven of Witches and Bogeymen!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
No more fake leftist news for you! The media might call them "liberals", but we know what they really are... Members of The Half Naked Blood-Crazed Coven of Witches and Bogeymen! It's about time those satanic snowflakes get what's been coming to 'em!

Install this extension to turn every instance of "liberals" to "The Half Naked Blood-Crazed Coven of Witches and Bogeymen" and expose them today!

Yeehaw!
